_88finder_document_noun.description: How to refer to documents when presenting the search results

$eref.description: These are the options for sorting the finder

___key.description: Rummager field name, with an optional preceding “-” to sort in descending order

___default.description: Indicates if this should be the default sort option

$eref.description: The facets shown to the user to refine their search.

___preposition.description: Text used to augment the description of the search when the facet is used.

___hide_facet_tag.description: Causes the facet to not have a facet tag shown in a finder

___key.description: The rummager field name used for this facet.

___open_value.description: Value that determines the open state (the key field is in the future) of a topical facet.

___type.description: Defines the UI component and how the facet is queried from the search API

___allowed_values.description: Possible values to show for non-dynamic select facets. All values are shown regardless of the search.

___filter_key.description: The exact rummager field name for this facet. Allows 'key' to be aliased to a rummager filter field

___keys.description: Field names used for the taxon drop down.

___display_as_result_metadata.description: Include this in search result metadata. Can be set for non-filterable facets.

___filterable.description: This must be true to show the facet to users.

___closed_value.description: Value that determines the closed state (the key field is in the past) of a topical facet.

___show_option_select_filter.description: Controls whether Option Select Facet displays a filter field

___option_lookup.description: A map of keys to values that can be used to associate allowed_values with multiple values

___filter_value.description: A preset filter value that is applied when a checkbox is selected

___combine_mode.description: Specifies how to combine with other facets
